title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Currently, there are multiple redraws occurring during text changes with word wrap in StyledText.
EB: This should be optimized to have a maximum of one redraw for each visible line. To reproduce the issue, please follow the steps below:
SR:
1. Open the application with the StyledText feature enabled.
2. Ensure that word wrap is enabled in the StyledText.
3. Make a text change, such as adding or deleting multiple lines.
4. Observe the number of redraws that occur during the text change with word wrap enabled.
